meanings.sent1: The decenary team won the game with ten players.
meanings.sent2: The decenary system is based on groups of ten.
meanings.sent3: The decenary cupcakes were perfectly arranged in rows of ten.
meanings.sent4: Her decenary approach to organizing made everything easier to manage.
meanings.sent5: The decenary pattern on the wallpaper was both simple and elegant.

meanings.sent1: The school choir consisted of a decenary of talented singers.
meanings.sent2: She counted a decenary of colorful balloons at the party.
meanings.sent3: The decenary of puppies ran around the yard in a playful frenzy.
meanings.sent4: The decenary of stars in the sky shone brightly on a clear night.
meanings.sent5: The decenary of books on the shelf caught her eye with their vibrant colors.
